faq_social_share: How to use the social sharing feature?
faq_social_share_answer: After completing a focus task in the app, click the "Share" button, select the social platform you want to share to (such as WeChat, Weibo, QQ, etc.), and you can share your focus achievements with friends. You can also create or join focus groups to maintain focus with friends.

faq_pomodoro: How to use the Pomodoro Technique feature?
faq_pomodoro_answer: Click the "Pomodoro Technique" button on the main interface, set the work duration (default 25 minutes) and rest duration (default 5 minutes), then click "Start". The system will automatically switch between work time and rest time, and notify you at the end of each phase.
